histogram.name: DirectWrite.Fonts.Gfx.InitializeLoopCount
histogram.summary: The number of iterations that was required to initialize Direct Write. This metric is recorded by the browser process at startup. The value -1 is reported when the initialization failed. The fallback path using GDI is used instead of DWrite.

histogram.name: DirectWrite.Fonts.Gfx.InitializeTime
histogram.summary: Time it takes to initialize GFX fonts. This metric is taken by the browser process at startup. It includes the time required to initialize Direct Write. This metric is recorded only on Windows.

histogram.name: DirectWrite.Fonts.Proxy.CreateFontFaceResult
histogram.summary: Records the error returned from CreateFontFace.

histogram.name: DirectWrite.Fonts.Proxy.EmptyFamilyResultsRatio
histogram.summary: When scanning fonts for meta data as part of local matching, record the ratio of empty per-family results to all per-family results as percentage. Recorded in DWriteFontTableBuilder at the time of finishing scanning the font files for their name meta information. A value of 100% means, all per-family scan tasks came back empty. A value of 0% means, all per-family tasks yielded at least one font file. Used for diagnosing https://crbug.com/1009402.

histogram.name: DirectWrite.Fonts.Proxy.Fallback.CacheSize
histogram.summary: Records how many font families are in the fallback cache.

histogram.name: DirectWrite.Fonts.Proxy.FallbackResult
histogram.summary: Measures the effectiveness of the font fallback proxy. This tracks if we were able to find a suitable font to render the character, and whether an IPC was necessary.

histogram.name: DirectWrite.Fonts.Proxy.FamilyCount
histogram.summary: The number of font families as seen by the font proxy in the renderer.

histogram.name: DirectWrite.Fonts.Proxy.FamilyCountIndexingStart
histogram.summary: Number of font families on the system as retrieved from DWrite API (usually less than to number of font files reported in DirectWrite.Fonts.Proxy.NumFontFiles as a family can contain multiple font files). Recorded in DWriteFontTableBuilder at the time of starting scanning the font files for their name meta information. Used for diagnosing https://crbug.com/1009402.

histogram.name: DirectWrite.Fonts.Proxy.FontProxyError
histogram.summary: The errors encountered by the DirectWrite font proxy while loading fonts.

histogram.name: DirectWrite.Fonts.Proxy.GetSystemFontCollectionResult
histogram.summary: Records the error returned from GetSystemFontCollection.

histogram.name: DirectWrite.Fonts.Proxy.IndexingSpeed
histogram.summary: Indexing speed in font files per second while building the local font unique name lookup table. Recorded after building the lookup table in DWriteFontLookupTableBuilder.

histogram.name: DirectWrite.Fonts.Proxy.LastResortFontCount
histogram.summary: The number of last resort fallback fonts found on the system as seen by the browser.

histogram.name: DirectWrite.Fonts.Proxy.LastResortFontFileCount
histogram.summary: The number of font files found for a last resort fallback font.

histogram.name: DirectWrite.Fonts.Proxy.LoaderType
histogram.summary: The codepath that was used to load a font family. This is logged in the browser every time a renderer attempts to load a font family, once per font file.

histogram.name: DirectWrite.Fonts.Proxy.LoadFamilyResult
histogram.summary: The outcome of attempting to load a font family in the renderer (success vs failure and number of families). This is logged in the renderer once per family that is loaded.

histogram.name: DirectWrite.Fonts.Proxy.LoadFamilyTime
histogram.summary: The time taken to load a font family, excluding glyph data. This is logged in the renderer once per family that is loaded.

histogram.name: DirectWrite.Fonts.Proxy.LookupTableBuildTime
histogram.summary: Time it takes to build the font unique name lookup table. Recorded at the initial build of this table, after which it is kept for the lifetime of the browser process. The start time is recorded when the actual task of starting to scan fonts has started.

histogram.name: DirectWrite.Fonts.Proxy.LookupTableDiskCacheHit
histogram.summary: Measures whether the font table lookup structure was loaded from disk cache or had to be rebuilt due to changes in installed fonts, DWrite version or Chrome version. Recorded when DWriteFontLookupTableBuilder starts to prepare the lookup table.

histogram.name: DirectWrite.Fonts.Proxy.LookupTablePersistSuccess
histogram.summary: Measures whether the font table lookup structure was successfully persisted to disk after having been constructed. Recorded when DWriteFontLookupTableBuilder finalizes the lookup table.

histogram.name: DirectWrite.Fonts.Proxy.LookupTableReadyTime
histogram.summary: Time it takes from scheduling the preparation of the font lookup table until it is ready, independent of whether it is read from cache or built by scanning fonts. Start time is recorded when the call is made to prepare the table. Duration and this histogram's value is recorded either when it is done reading from cache or when the table construction is ready. This metric includes a scheduling delay from when the task to read from cache or build is scheduled, untils its execution, while DirectWrite.Fonts.Proxy.LookupTableBuildTime does not include this scheduling delay and measures only from when the first font scanning task is started.

histogram.name: DirectWrite.Fonts.Proxy.LookupTableSize
histogram.summary: Size of the font unique name lookup table in kilobytes. Recorded at the initial build of this table, after which it is kept for the lifetime of the browser process.

histogram.name: DirectWrite.Fonts.Proxy.MessageFilterError
histogram.summary: Errors, if any, encountered by the DirectWrite font proxy message filter.

histogram.name: DirectWrite.Fonts.Proxy.MostFrequentScanningFailure
histogram.summary: When scanning fonts for meta data as part of local matching, record the most frequent failure of why no meta data was gathered for a font family. Recorded in DWriteFontTableBuilder at the time of finishing scanning the font files for their name meta information. Values are Windows HRESULT error codes, including custom values for implementation specific failure cases. Used for diagnosing https://crbug.com/1009402.

histogram.name: DirectWrite.Fonts.Proxy.NumFontFiles
histogram.summary: Number of font files which were encountered during scanning for locally installed font and building the unique font name lookup table. Recorded in DWriteFontTableBuilder while after the building the lookup table. Kept for the lifetime of the browser process after that.

histogram.name: DirectWrite.Fonts.Proxy.TableBuildTimedOut
histogram.summary: Shows whether the font lookup table construction timed out. Recorded when DWriteFontLookupTableBuilder finalizes the lookup table.
